channel.title: ~~~FurkanScape Dev Team~~~ (recruiting) (re-do)
channel.description:
[size=16pt]Recruiting for a development team called ~~~FurkanScape~~~[/size]
Some information about the server: Server has specials I think at least 4 quests working Attacking monsters for money and leveling up
[font=Red]Future Updates: Adding silabs to server Adding mini-games :) Working specials for god swords 90% working specials :)[/font]
Client Information: Client almost is done client is 377 cache client can use silabsoft items :)
Use this to register for the Dev Team: [code]In-Game name: Job: Experience: Average time on computer: (must need)Msn name: Will you leave us: Why do you want: Age: [/code]
[center]Owner -Mod Furkan -Mod Dan[/center]
[center]Co-owner -Mod Rape[/center]
[center]Admins -rs w00dcut -Owned by me[/center]
[center]Coders(in-game admins) - -Waffles!![/center]
[center]Global Moderators(forums) -seanmac7[/center]
[center]Advertisers(in-game mod) -Digzey - -[/center]
Thankz for reading This will be updated :)
